analysis.key_quote: Changing these positions to political appointees would be disastrous. I don't want ANY President having that level of influence over the details of such a large institution as the US Civil Service.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the implementation of Schedule F, highlighting concerns about the politicization of civil service and the potential loss of merit-based protections. It emphasizes the dangers of concentrated power and the negative impact on employee rights and institutional integrity.
